text: Hontoni arra no omoto no oshie wa, isuramu (omo no ishi ni fukuju, kie suru koto)dearu. Keiten o sadzuke rareta hitobito ga, chishiki ga kudatta nochi ni ai arasou no wa, tada kare-ra no ma no netami karadearu. Arra no shirushi o kyohi suru mono ga areba, arra wa hontoni seisan ni jinsokude ara reru
